whatIs.title:
What is

UDC 2019
whatIs.description:
The Upbit Developer Conference combines free exchange of
ideas, numerous networking events,
and programs for future blockchain game changers to
present the ultimate developer-centric conference.
We invite you to be a part of UDC 2019, the next big event
for blockchain developers.
Join us next September at Upbit Developer Conference
2019 to celebrate blockchain technology and
developers.
whatIs.description_m:
The Upbit Developer Conference combines
free exchange of ideas, numerous networking
events, and programs for future blockchain
game changers to present the ultimate
developer-centric conference.
We invite you to be a part of UDC 2019,
the next big event for blockchain developers.
Join us next September at Upbit Developer
Conference 2019 to celebrate blockchain
technology and developers.

conference.title: 2019 Conference
conference.desc1:
Sessions focused on how world-class developers
are using blockchain technology to create projects
and services that solve real world problems.
Sessions focused on how world-class developers are using
blockchain technology to create projects and services that
solve real world problems.

exhibition.title: UDC Exhibition
exhibition.desc1:
UDC 2019’s Exhibition zone features a wide variety
of services that showcase cutting-edge blockchain
technology.
UDC 2019’s Exhibition zone features a wide variety of services
that showcase cutting-edge blockchain technology.

handson.title: UDC Hands-on
handson.desc1:
UDC 2019 provides hands-on opportunity to directly
experience and understand blockchain services.
UDC 2019 provides hands-on opportunity to directly
experience and understand blockchain services.
imgDesc: Only registered UDC 2019 attendees are <br class="mobile-only">eligible to <br class="pc-only">participate in the Hands-on program.
Registration is on a first-come, <br class="mobile-only">first-serve basis.

hackerton.title: UDC Hackathon <small class="bottom">With Luniverse</small>
hackerton.desc1:
Utilize Luniverse, the best DApp development tool
in the market, to create your own DApp.
Utilize Luniverse, the best DApp development
tool in the market, to create your own DApp.

freeLecture.title: <small>UDC 2019 </small> Blockchain Free Lecture
freeLecture.desc1:
UDC provides the Blockchain Open Lecture
for those interested in the basics of blockchain.

for those interested in the basics of blockchain.
